mapper.sql: ID, CREATE_TIME, USER_NAME, NICK_NAME, SEX, BIRTHDAY, EMAIL, ID_NUMBER, PHONE, HOME_PHONE, ACCOUNT_ID, MARK,REAL_NAME_VALID,DENIED,DENIED_REASON
mapper.select: SELECT u.ID, u.CREATE_TIME, u.USER_NAME, u.NICK_NAME, u.SEX, u.BIRTHDAY, u.EMAIL, u.ID_NUMBER, u.PHONE, u.HOME_PHONE, u.ACCOUNT_ID, u.MARK,u.REAL_NAME_VALID,u.DENIED,u.DENIED_REASON,u.DESCRIPTION,r.ID AS ROLE_ID,r.CREATE_TIME AS ROLE_CREATE_TIME, r.ROLE_CODE,r.ROLE_NAME,r.MARK AS ROLE_MARK FROM ballchen_t_user_basic_role AS ur INNER JOIN ballchen_t_user_basic AS u ON ur.USER_BASIC_ID = u.ID INNER JOIN ballchen_t_role AS r ON ur.ROLE_ID = r.ID WHERE u.ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into ballchen_t_user_basic (ID, CREATE_TIME, USER_NAME, NICK_NAME, SEX, BIRTHDAY, EMAIL, ID_NUMBER, PHONE, HOME_PHONE, ACCOUNT_ID, MARK,REAL_NAME_VALID,DENIED,DENIED_REASON DESCRIPTION) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nickName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=BIT}, #{birthday,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{idNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{homePhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{accountId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{realNameValid,jdbcType=BIT},#{denied,jdbcType=BIT},#{deniedReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update ballchen_t_user_basic
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
USER_NAME = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NICK_NAME = #{nickName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SEX = #{sex,jdbcType=BIT},
BIRTHDAY = #{birthday,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
EMAIL = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ID_NUMBER = #{idNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PHONE = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
HOME_PHONE = #{homePhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ACCOUNT_ID = #{accountId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MARK = #{mark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REAL_NAME_VALID = #{realNameValid,jdbcType=BIT},
DENIED = #{denied,jdbcType=BIT},
DENIED_REASON = #{deniedReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DESCRIPTION = #{description,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update ballchen_t_user_basic set CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, USER_NAME = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NICK_NAME = #{nickName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SEX = #{sex,jdbcType=BIT}, BIRTHDAY = #{birthday,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, EMAIL = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ID_NUMBER = #{idNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PHONE = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HOME_PHONE = #{homePhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ACCOUNT_ID = #{accountId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MARK = #{mark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REAL_NAME_VALID = #{realNameValid,jdbcType=BIT}, DENIED = #{denied,jdbcType=BIT}, DENIED_REASON = #{deniedReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DESCRIPTION = #{description,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update ballchen_t_user_basic set CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, USER_NAME = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NICK_NAME = #{nickName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SEX = #{sex,jdbcType=BIT}, BIRTHDAY = #{birthday,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, EMAIL = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ID_NUMBER = #{idNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PHONE = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HOME_PHONE = #{homePhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ACCOUNT_ID = #{accountId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MARK = #{mark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REAL_NAME_VALID = #{realNameValid,jdbcType=BIT}, DENIED = #{denied,jdbcType=BIT}, DENIED_REASON = #{deniedReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM ballchen_t_user_basic
AND CREATE_TIME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{createTime,jdbcType=DATE},'%' )
AND CREATE_TIME BETWEEN #{createTime,jdbcType=DATE} AND #{endTime,jdbcType=DATE}
AND CREATE_TIME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{endTime,jdbcType=DATE},'%' )
AND USER_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%' )
AND NICK_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{nickName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%' )
AND SEX = #{sex,jdbcType=BIT}
AND BIRTHDAY LIKE CONCAT('%',#{birthday,jdbcType=DATE},'%' )
AND BIRTHDAY BETWEEN #{birthday,jdbcType=DATE} AND #{endBirthday,jdbcType=DATE}
AND BIRTHDAY LIKE CONCAT('%',#{endBirthday,jdbcType=DATE},'%' )
AND EMAIL LIKE CONCAT('%',#{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%' )
AND ID_NUMBER LIKE CONCAT('%',#{idNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%' )
AND PHONE LIKE CONCAT('%',#{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%' )
AND HOME_PHONE LIKE CONCAT('%',#{homePhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%' )
AND ACCOUNT_ID LIKE CONCAT('%',#{accountId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%' )
AND MARK LIKE CONCAT('%',#{mark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%' )
AND REAL_NAME_VALID = #{realNameValid,jdbcType=BIT}
AND DENIED = #{denied,jdbcType=BIT}
AND DENIED_REASON LIKE CONCAT('%',#{deniedReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%' )
ORDER BY CREATE_TIME ${order} LIMIT #{limit,jdbcType=INTEGER} OFFSET #{offset,jdbcType=INTEGER}
